txt.en: 'We have done all we can here. Klúso will keep an eye on Thyrstáth. It is time to continue our search for Dushtalbúk, Loknashra, and the staff. Let us continue up the Father's Path. We should find Kyrstig, the last of Ausma's apprentices, somewhere nearby. Keep an eye out for her flare.'
TBD
Kyrstig, the last of Ausma's scouts, can be found further up the Father's Path.\n\nYou should find Kyrstig with Hórin.
Find Kyrstig near the Thing-fold
You have found Kyrstig near Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold.\n\nYou should talk to Kyrstig.
TBD Welkin-lofts Arc 6
The time has come to continue up the mountain in search of Kyrstig, the last of Ausma's apprentices.
Kyrstig mentioned a dwarf-fort called Bagud-dum which seems to be the Angmarim's main base of operations in the Welkin-lofts.\n\nYou should find Bagud-dum.
A flare shoots off from the top of the hill before you
'This must be the place. I hate to see such a grand dwarf-fort taken over by Men of evil. We should discuss our plan of attack.'
Find the entrance to the dwarf-fort of Bagud-dum
Hórin can be called with the summoning horn.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
Talk to Kyrstig by the Thing-fold
A Clandestine Meeting
Call Hórin and talk to him
Talk to Kyrstig by the Thing-fold and hear her report
Kyrstig waves as you approach
Kyrstig is ready to give you her scouting report.\n\nYou should talk to Kyrstig at Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold and complete 'Instance: A Clandestine Meeting'.
Talk to Hórin by the Thing-fold
Hórin can be found near Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin.
DNT
You have found the dwarf-fort known as Bagud-dum

'[placeholder]! Good to see you again. Welcome to Ibdêkh-buzru, the Thing-fold. This is a place of much historic significance for all dwarves. Within these walls, the great Dwarrowmoots take place, where the Kings of all the clans are called together to make important decisions, like declarations of war!\n\n'I brought a few dwarves up here to set up a staging area to the higher peaks. It's not much, but please use it should you need to rest. Oh, and one more thing... I saw the hobgoblins!'

'Loknashra is making secret deals with the Angmarim? What are they doing that she does not want Dushtalbúk to know about? Finding her and the staff have just become an even more pressing matter! Come, we must continue up the path and find this fort Kyrstig mentioned in her report.'
'This must be the place. I hate to see such a grand dwarf-fort taken over by Men of evil. We should discuss our plan of attack.'
Call Hórin and talk to him
'Are you ready to receive my report?'
